name: AHOI Video Chat: Swipe, Meet, Match
description: AHOI Video Chat:  1: Swipe with Millions to find people and to start new conversations 2: Meet new people and make friends in live video calls 3: Match to stay connected and see each other again  AHOI is a free live video chat app to meet new people with the same interests from all over the world. Create your profile, show off your interests and connect with like-minded people. Dont waste your time by messaging with total strangers who later turn out to be complete douchebags.   AHOI gives you the chance to experience real and authentic face-to-face video chats. You have the choice of who you want to meet. Within seconds you can swipe and decide whether you want to stay connected or not. After 5 seconds have passed youre automatically connected  its a match! And if not... there are a lot more people waiting in your live video chat. Try it out!   The Uniqueness of AHOI   Set up your profile with interest-based stickers and start meeting new people.  The choice is yours: Decide whether you want to meet the person on the profile or not.  If yes, wait for the counted seconds to run down.  If no, swipe left to see more profiles.  Define your interests & connect with like-minded people.   AHOI is full of fun and excitement. Communication across the world has never been simpler. Get to know other cultures, learn a new skill or improve your languages. Its up to you how you use AHOI and make the most out of it.  Install the video chat app AHOI for free and meet YOUR people!
